intro: Chirita ningmingensis, commonly known as the Ningming chireta, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its compact growth habit and showy flowers. The plant typically produces violet or purple tubular flowers that bloom in the spring. It thrives in shaded, moist environments and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
